eventTags: Things to do in New York, NY
eventDescription:
Vaccine Comedy is a weekly show born during the pandemic headed back for a banger at Baby Brasa, a Peruvian restaurant known for its signature dishes and cocktails. Come join us in the West Village at 173 7th Ave S, New York, NY 10014.

This show will take place on the covered patio, and will feature some of New York's finest comedians to keep you laughing into the evening. A ticket will reserve your seat and includes an appetizer. You must have a ticket to ensure space in the reserved comedy section. RESERVE EARLY BEFORE IT RUNS OUT!

THIS LINEUP INCLUDES:

KATE WILLET (Colbert, Netflix, Comedy Central)

GRAHAM KAY (Colbert, NBC)

MATTEO LANE (NETFLIX, IFC, COMEDY CENTRAL, COLBERT)

LIZ GLAZER

ALI MEHEDI

CHLOE RADCLIFFE

ELI TRICHON

PIERS MORETON

FOLLOW @vaccinecomedy FOR UPDATES.

eventTitle: Kings County Comedy by Mike Toohey at Eastville Comedy Club
eventTags: Things to do in New York, NY
eventDescription:
Eastville is the only bonafide comedy club in the borough of Brooklyn! EastVille is also the only comedy club with NO drink minimums! We've SUSPENDED the 2 drink minimum in the name of phenomenal comedy in Brooklyn! We still offer specialty crafted cocktails to quench your thirst if you so desire. Along with yummy homemade popcorn and candy.

Terms & Conditions

Arrive 30 mins before showtime as seating is on a first-come basis.

Those arriving late are not guaranteed seats; as we begin seating standby customers.

If reservations are missed; tickets may be used another time without penalty.

All ages welcome: Shows may contain adult content but there are no age restrictions.

Arriving intoxicated is prohibited.

Open at 35% capacity.

All tables 6 feet apart, and masks required to enter.

All Social distancing safety measures are employed.

Individual comedian appearances subject to change without notice.

Groups of 7+ please email bestcomedytickets@gmail.com

No refunds due to inclement weather.

All sales final - no refunds or transfers.

Walk up cover is higher than online presale price.

NY State Tax (8.875%) additional.

ALL SALES ARE FINAL.

eventTitle: Fickle Comedy at Eastville Comedy Club
eventTags: Things to do in New York, NY
eventDescription:
Fickle Comedy is at Eastville Comedy Club in Downtown Brooklyn on Mondays at 9:30pm. Doors open half an hour before show time so please arrive early to gran a seat. Enjoy drinks and popcorn without the drink minimums.

Each week features diverse comics seen on Comedy Central, Colbert, Just for Laughs, and the Comedy Cellar. Limited tickets so please reserve your spot early. Check back for the new lineup every week or follow us on IG @ficklecomedy.

**Shows are indoors with limited socially distanced seating. Masks and temperature checks are mandatory.**

eventTitle: Greenwich Village Comedy Club - NYC's Best Comedy Club
eventTags: Things to do in New York, NY
eventDescription:
Location: Greenwich Village Comedy Club New York, NY

Greenwich Village Comedy Club presents a lineup full of our Top Headliners.

These are the best comedians from New York City with special guests from all across the country.

You've seen them on MTV, HBO, The Tonight Show, Comedy Central, The Daily Show, Last Comic Standing, and more!

Comedians:

This month:

Rebecca Kaplan,

Nina Barnett,

Brian Kim,

Talia Reese.

Terms & Conditions

Must be 16 & over or 13+ with an adult.

Two Drink Minimum per person.

Individual comedian appearances subject to change without notice.

Temperature checks upon entering.

All waitstaff will be in masks.

All tables and chairs disinfected between shows.

Sanitizing stations available.

Social Distancing for all parties.

Groups of 7+ please email BestComedyTickets@gmail.com

No refunds due to inclement weather All sales final - no refunds or transfers.

NY State Tax (8.875%) additional ALL SALES ARE FINAL.

The purchase of a ticket DOES NOT  include a reservation, please make a reservation by calling the club: +1 646-682-9071

MUST SHOW UP 30 MINUTES BEFORE SHOWTIME.

eventTitle: Broadway Comedy Club - NYC Best Comedy Club
eventTags: Things to do in New York, NY
eventDescription:
Location: Broadway Comedy Club New York, NY - Main Room

The world-famous Broadway Comedy Club is located just outside Times Square in the historic Broadway Theater District, Manhattan.

The Broadway Comedy Club presents a lineup full of some of the best professional comedians in the country. These are the best comedians from New York City with special guests from all across the country.

You've seen them on MTV, HBO, The Tonight Show, Comedy Central, The Daily Show, Last Comic Standing, and more!

eventTitle: THE Greatest Comedy Show of ALL Time!
eventTags: Things to do in New York, NY
eventDescription:
'THE Greatest Comedy Show of ALL Time' is returning to the legendary Broadway Comedy Club in New York City to bring you a hilarious lineup of NYC's funniest comedians. Hosted by Ron Prendimano (Laffin' Matterz TV) and featuring:

  • Riley Lassin (Cane and Corey Show With Riley ALT 92.3)
  • Christiana Jackson (Stout Lusty Wench w/ Christiana Jackson)
  • Carlos Garcia (HuffPost, FratChatPodcast)
  • Ali Mehedi (Stand Up NBC)
  • Chris Moore (eBaum's World, FratChat Podcast)

Don't miss your chance to be a part of the show and see this phenomenal lineup. Limited seating is available at 33% capacity. Get your tickets today!

eventTitle: "Feel Nothing or Everything" comedy at Eastville Comedy Club

eventDescription:
"Feel Nothing or Everything" Comedy Open Mic! Brooklyn's favorite open mic is BACK and pandemic-ally friendly! Hosted by Julie Ray & Julia Schactner - Come watch/ do comedy, drink, and laugh out loud in a socially-distanced way!

TO SIGN UP & PERFORM:We have 16 bucket lottery spots so show up, and put your name in the bucket!*These tickets are to watch the open mic (not to perform).

eventTitle: Lantern Comedy Presents: The Comedy Shop
eventTags: Things to do in New York, NY
eventDescription:
House rules:

  • Tickets are $10 online, or $15 cash at the door.
  • Please note there is a 2 item minimum inside the showroom.
  • Due to extremely limited seating, all ticket-holders must arrive and check in 15 minutes BEFORE showtime. If you have not checked in by 15 minutes AFTER showtime, we reserve the right to fill your seat and you will not receive a refund.

Covid precautions:

  • Groups of 2 to 8 only
  • All groups will be socially distanced from other groups
  • Audience REQUIRED to wear mask when not eating or drinking
  • Sanitizing stations will be available
  • Tables and chairs will be disinfected between shows

Individual comedian appearance is subject to change without notice.

Note this is our main event page for Thursday-Saturday shows. We also have a half-price show on Wednesdays and Sundays!

eventTitle: Distantly Social: A Safe, Distanced Standup Comedy Evening!
eventOrganizer: by The 13th Step Bar and Grill
eventTags: Things to do in New York, NY
eventDescription:
An all-professional lineup of some of NYC's best comics, brought to you on a weekly basis in the dedicated rear rooms of the East Village's The 13th Step Bar and Grill! Don't get conned into paying for a show with the worst amateurs. The comedians you'll see here have been on Netflix, HBO, Showtime, The Tonight Show, Colbert, Letterman, Conan and more!

The 13th Step is committed to the health and safety of our patrons, staff and comics. Following the CDC's guidance, temperature checks and contact tracing information is taken at the door, all tables are 6 feet apart and premium-quality MERV 13 air filters are in place.

eventTitle: Ambush Comedy on a Brooklyn Rooftop
eventTags: Things to do in New York, NY
eventDescription:
Ambush Comedy is back outside, on the rooftop of the Tiny Cupboard (@thetinycupboard), every Tuesday at 7pm.

Join Lucas Connolly, David Piccolomini, and Brittany Cardwell for stacked lineups of top comics from NYC and beyond.

**Limited entry/Must reserve!: order a FREE ticket and we'll email you the venue access info and COVID safety guidelines.

This week’s lineup features:

Katie Hannigan (Comedy Central, Colbert)

Ashley Gavin (Hulu, We're Having Gay Sex podcast)

Josh Johnson (Comedy Central's The Daily Show)

Sam Evans (Just For Laughs)

Chloe Radcliffe (Fallon)

Yemi Afolabi (New York Comedy Festival)

Hosted by Adam Muller (Uncommon Wealth podcast)

Follow us on Instagram @ambushcomedy

eventLocation: Exact location will be emailed day of, Brooklyn, NY 11211
eventTags: Things to do in New York, NY
eventDescription:
What happens when two comedians from Palestine and Thailand meet? They put on comedy shows to laugh off their struggles!

You can expect comics of the hilarious kind, many comics of the women kind, and even more comics of the diverse kind!

Comedians performing on Double Threat Comedy include national headliners like Mark Normand and comedians featured on Comedy Central, Netflix, the Comedy Cellar, Colbert, Conan, and Fallon.

﻿Join Shatha Yas and Ann Chunharakchote along with NYC's top comedians for a night of fun and good vibes!
